channel.title: Steam - Everything Half Life on sale this weekend!
channel.description:
I wasn't sure whether to put this in games or here, but since it's entirely about the Half Life series, I'm putting it here.
All Half Life games and packages are 66% off!
[url]https://store.steampowered.com/[/url]
I lost my copy of Half Life and Opposing Forces some time ago (and never played Blue Shift), so I'm picking up the HL1 Anthology pack for $5!
I realize most of you probably already have most of the games, but it is still a great deal.
The Wandering God

no, i am not him , i’m doing it for the lulz

item.title: Steam - Everything Half Life on sale this weekend!
item.dc:creator: The_Wandering_God
item.description:
OldDirtyBastard:

Why don’t you post it in the chat thread?
Steam advertisments here are… err, how to put it, unnecessary.

Sorry. I really thought this would be the most appropriate place to put it. (And if wasn’t such a limited time deal, I wouldn’t have said anything at all.)

Should I make a duplicate post in this thread then? Or maybe a mod could movie it?

I’ll try to refrain from such foolishness in the future.

The Wandering God

Read full topic
